oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Minute book of the Concord, Tennessee Grand Army of the Republic post
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the minute book of the Grand Army of the Republic post in Concord, (Knox County) Tennessee. The minute book was kept by the post commander, Romulus Calhoun Bonham, Co. K, 1st Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA. Page 40 mentions a reunion of Union and Confederate veterans on November 23, 1895.
